events.message: I recently received my order, but unfortunately I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected and I no longer need it.
The customer's inquiry has been reviewed and categorized under refund due to their request for returning the product and getting their money back.
An agent from the Returns Department has been assigned to handle the refund request and assist the customer promptly.

Sure, my order number is 123456789. The package was opened but the product has not been used at all, I just changed my mind.
Thanks for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please ship the product back to us within 10 days using the prepaid return label we will send you shortly.
I appreciate your help and quick response. I will send the product back today and look forward to the refund once you receive it.
We have received the returned product and processed your full refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund successfully. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been completed and you confirmed receipt, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and for choosing us.
